channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump order ending collective bargaining rights for most federal workers
item.description: A Trump administration executive order that would strip most federal workers of union protections was temporarily blocked a federal judge on Friday.

item.title: States warned federal funding is in jeopardy if illegal immigrants are collecting unemployment benefits
item.description: Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer warned all 50 states Friday about illegal immigrants collecting taxpayer-funded unemployment benefits.

item.title: Kennedy Center cancels LGBTQ+ Pride events to align with new priorities after Trump fired center's leadership

item.title: DOJ asks court to allow El Salvador deportations despite Boasberg's ruling

item.title: Gun Control Doesn’t Stop Shootings Outside The United States, So It Won’t Here Either
item.description: Targeted attacks on schools are not uniquely American. They are global phenomena driven by evil, not geography or firearms laws.

item.title: Nancy Mace torches Clemson University over 15-gender menu: 'Not on my watch'

item.title: The Week: Pope Francis’s Death, and His Successor’s Challenges
item.description: Plus: Harvard files suit over an executive order cutting off its federal funding.

item.title: SCOTUS’s Refusal To End Leftists’ Judicial Coup Is Damaging Its Credibility More Than The Media Ever Could
item.description: By refusing to rein in the lower courts' lawlessness, SCOTUS has greenlit a judicial coup that is stymying the will of 77 million Americans.

item.title: NYT Wants You To Feel Very Sorry For This Drug-Dealing Kidnapper Trump Deported
item.description: He made bad choices and is owed no sympathy. He owes the U.S. thanks for the opportunities he was given even after conviction.

item.title: Three Rogue Judges Block Trump Admin Efforts To Eradicate Discriminatory DEI From Schools

item.title: China stops tariffs on some U.S. semiconductors

item.title: A Democratic Party at War over Generational and Strategic Change
item.description: David Hogg’s controversial initiative targeting incumbents is only part of a much larger struggle.

item.title: Is Scott Pelley Going to Apologize?
item.description: The Supreme Court case on ‘LGBTQ-inclusive’ books shows how unfair he was.

item.title: Ending Disparate Impact Lawsuits Is a Victory for Equal Opportunity
item.description: Donald Trump’s executive order ends the executive branch’s role in rewriting the law and promoting discrimination in the name of equality.

item.title: Bond Markets Are Flashing Red, and Congress Must Heed the Warning
item.description: The smoke alarm is going off. Washington’s next move will determine whether it becomes a fire drill or a four-alarm blaze.
